member.name: T:ControlTreeView.INodeContainer
member.summary: The container for CTreeNodeCollection.

member.name: M:ControlTreeView.INodeContainer.ExpandAll
member.summary: Expands all the tree nodes of this INodeContainer.

member.name: M:ControlTreeView.INodeContainer.CollapseAll
member.summary: Collapses all the tree nodes of this INodeContainer.

member.name: M:ControlTreeView.INodeContainer.GetNodeCount(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the number of child tree nodes.
member.param: true if the resulting count includes all tree nodes indirectly rooted at the tree node collection; otherwise, false.
member.returns: The number of child tree nodes assigned to the CTreeNodeCollection.

member.name: P:ControlTreeView.INodeContainer.Nodes
member.summary: Gets the collection of tree nodes that are assigned to this INodeContainer.

member.name: P:ControlTreeView.INodeContainer.FirstNode
member.summary: Gets the first child tree node in the tree node collection.

member.summary: Gets the last child tree node in the tree node collection.

member.summary: Gets the TreeView that the CTreeNodeCollection of this INodeContainer is assigned to.

member.name: P:ControlTreeView.INodeContainer.BoundsSubtree
member.summary: Gets the bounds of this INodeContainer includes all child tree nodes.

member.name: P:ControlTreeView.INodeContainer.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the INodeContainer.

member.name: F:ControlTreeView.CTreeView.rootLines
member.summary: The list of lines for the CTreeView.

true if need scroll down, otherwise, false.
true if need scroll right, otherwise, false.
true if need scroll left, otherwise, false.

member.summary: Checking a valid of drop operation in current destination.

member.returns: true if drop of source nodes is allowed to current destination, otherwise, false.

member.name: M:ControlTreeView.CTreeView.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the CTreeView class.

member.name: M:ControlTreeView.CTreeView.CollapseAll
member.summary: Collapses all the tree nodes.

member.name: M:ControlTreeView.CTreeView.ExpandAll
member.summary: Expands all the tree nodes.

member.name: M:ControlTreeView.CTreeView.GetNodeCount(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves the number of tree nodes, optionally including those in all subtrees, assigned to the CTreeView control.
member.param: true to count the CTreeNode items that the subtrees contain; otherwise, false.
member.returns: The number of tree nodes, optionally including those in all subtrees, assigned to the CTreeView control.

member.name: M:ControlTreeView.CTreeView.GetNodeAt(System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Retrieves the tree node that is at the specified point.
member.param: The Point to evaluate and retrieve the node from.
member.returns: The CTreeNode at the specified point, in client coordinates, or null if there is no node at that location.

member.name: M:ControlTreeView.CTreeView.GetNodeAt(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the tree node at the point with the specified coordinates.
member.param: The X position to evaluate and retrieve the node from.
The Y position to evaluate and retrieve the node from.
member.returns: The CTreeNode at the specified location, in CTreeView (client) coordinates, or null if there is no node at that location.

member.name: M:ControlTreeView.CTreeView.BeginUpdate
member.summary: Disables recalculating of the CTreeView.

member.name: M:ControlTreeView.CTreeView.EndUpdate
member.summary: Enables the recalculating of the CTreeView.

member.name: P:ControlTreeView.CTreeView.DefaultSize
member.summary: Gets the default size of the control.
member.value: The default Size of the control.

member.name: P:ControlTreeView.CTreeView.Nodes
member.summary: Gets the collection of tree nodes that are assigned to the CTreeView control.

member.name: P:ControlTreeView.CTreeView.PathSeparator
member.summary: Gets or sets the delimiter string that the tree node path uses.
member.value: The delimiter string that the tree node CTreeNode.FullPath property uses. The default is the backslash character (\).

member.name: P:ControlTreeView.CTreeView.FirstNode
member.summary: Gets the first child tree node in the tree node collection.
member.value: The first child CTreeNode in the Nodes collection.

member.name: P:ControlTreeView.CTreeView.LastNode
member.summary: Gets the last child tree node in the tree node collection.
member.value: A CTreeNode that represents the last child tree node.

member.name: P:ControlTreeView.CTreeView.DrawStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets way that will draw the CTreeView.

member.name: P:ControlTreeView.CTreeView.PlusMinus
member.summary: Gets or sets a bitmaps for plus-sign (+) and minus-sign (-) buttons of this CTreeView.

member.name: P:ControlTreeView.CTreeView.ShowPlusMinus
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether plus-sign (+) and minus-sign (-) buttons are displayed next to tree nodes that contain child tree nodes.
member.value: true if plus sign and minus sign buttons are displayed next to tree nodes that contain child tree nodes; otherwise, false. The default is true.

member.name: P:ControlTreeView.CTreeView.ShowLines
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether lines are drawn between tree nodes.
member.value: true if lines are drawn between tree nodes; otherwise, false. The default is true.

member.name: P:ControlTreeView.CTreeView.ShowRootLines
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether lines are drawn for the root nodes of the CTreeView.
member.value: true if lines are drawn for the root nodes of the CTreeView; otherwise, false. The default is true.

member.name: P:ControlTreeView.CTreeView.MinimizeCollapsed
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether position of nodes recalculated when collapsing for diagram style of this CTreeView.

member.name: P:ControlTreeView.CTreeView.IndentDepth
member.summary: Gets or sets the distance to indent each child tree node level.

member.name: P:ControlTreeView.CTreeView.IndentWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimal distance between child tree nodes.

member.name: P:ControlTreeView.CTreeView.LinesPen
member.summary: Gets or sets the Pen for drawing lines of this CTreeView

member.name: P:ControlTreeView.CTreeView.BoundsSubtree
member.summary: The union of all child nodes bounds.

Action will be applied to the nodes.

member.name: M:ControlTreeView.CTreeNodeCollection.AddRange(ControlTreeView.CTreeNode[])
member.summary: Adds an array of previously created tree nodes to the collection.
member.param: An array of CTreeNode objects representing the tree nodes to add to the collection.

member.name: M:ControlTreeView.CTreeNodeCollection.InsertRange(System.Int32,ControlTreeView.CTreeNode[])
member.summary: Inserts an array of previously created tree nodes to the collection at the specific position.
member.param: The zero-based index at which nodes should be inserted.
An array of CTreeNode objects representing the tree nodes to add to the collection.

member.name: M:ControlTreeView.CTreeNodeCollection.Find(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Finds the tree nodes with specified key, optionally searching subnodes.
member.param: The name of the tree node to search for.
true to search child nodes of tree nodes; otherwise, false.
member.returns: An array of CTreeNode objects whose Name property matches the specified key.

member.name: M:ControlTreeView.CTreeNodeCollection.RemoveByKey(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the tree node with the specified key from the collection.
member.param: The name of the tree node to remove from the collection.

member.name: M:ControlTreeView.CTreeNodeCollection.IndexOfKey(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the index of the first occurrence of a tree node with the specified key.
member.param: The name of the tree node to search for.
member.returns: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of a tree node with the specified key, if found; otherwise, -1.

member.name: M:ControlTreeView.CTreeNodeCollection.ContainsKey(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether the collection contains a tree node with the specified key.
member.param: The name of the CTreeNode to search for.
member.returns: true to indicate the collection contains a CTreeNode with the specified key; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Create a new instanse of CTreeNodeCollection assigned to specified owner.
member.param: CTreeNode or CTreeView.

member.summary: Inserts an element into the Collection at the specified index.
member.param: The zero-based index at which item should be inserted.
The object to insert. The value can be null for reference types.

member.name: M:ControlTreeView.CTreeNodeCollection.RemoveItem(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the element at the specified index of the Collection.
member.param: The zero-based index of the element to remove.

member.name: M:ControlTreeView.CTreeNodeCollection.SetItem(System.Int32,ControlTreeView.CTreeNode)
member.summary: Replaces the element at the specified index.
member.param: The zero-based index of the element to replace.
The new value for the element at the specified index. The value can be null for reference types.

member.name: M:ControlTreeView.CTreeNodeCollection.ClearItems
member.summary: Removes all elements from the Collection.

member.summary: Get the list includes common line and lines for nodes of this CTreeNodeCollection.
member.param: Function that calculates common line of nodes collection.
Function that calculates line of each node in collection.
member.returns: List of lines of this nodes collection.
